text_block_list.text: The Selection Race was held four times a year at the Academy for trainers to assess the abilities of horsegirls.
In the midst of this lively venue filled with eager horsegirl fans and numerous trainers who had gathered to watch the race, all eyes were on one particular horsegirl.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: To show great results in the Twinkle series and seize victory in the Tenno Sho… This is the duty that has been entrusted to me as a proud member of the Mejiro family.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For that reason, I must achieve good results without fail…!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Among the many talented horsegirls the Mejiro family has produced, could she be one of their treasured prodigies? I'm curious to see what kind of performance she'll display.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: She had an excellent reputation as a stayer even before enrolling into the Academy, right? It looks like she's going to perform well this time, too!
At the heart of all this attention is none other than the breathtakingly beautiful gray horsegirl — Mejiro McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: McQueen! It looks like our group's about to start soon. Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah… yes! Thank you for the reminder, Miss Ines Fujin.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: … Let us proceed!
And so, the Selection Race finally began!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: We are approaching the final stretch of the race now! However, the highly anticipated Mejiro McQueen is still trailing behind!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha… ugh!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: … And her running looks rather weak now. Has she exhausted her stamina?

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Hmm, I thought she would be a more capable stayer… but maybe I had set my expectations too high.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ugh…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: She's running with all her might, but Mcqueen isn't pulling through!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Ines Fujin is in the lead and… CROSSES THE LINE!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The winner of the Selection Race is none other than Ines Fujin! The stadium is roaring with the cheers of anticipation for her bright future!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa…! Hehe, thanks for your support, everyone! It's all thanks to you I was able to come first!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Ines Fujin… she has real potential in her legs. With the appropriate training, she could go very far.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Absolutely, I would love for her to join our team right now…!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: However, that girl we were talking about earlier… Hmm, she didn't quite live up to expectations.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ugh… I'm so disappointed in myself!
Ines Fujin had stolen the spotlight from Mejiro McQueen, who failed to deliver results and finished in 7th place.
However ――
Driven by curiosity I visited the training course. And there, I came across Mejiro McQueen in full stride, running…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, ha, ha…!! Haa…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: … Not enough. This is still not enough…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ah… so it really was you, McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ……? Ah, Ryan… Did you have business with me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: No, I didn't have any specific business with you. It's just that I saw you on the course, that's all…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: McQueen, you're pushing yourself a bit too hard! You must be tired from the Selection Race today, right? If you keep continuing like this, you will…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: … I appreciate your concern. However, I want to continue for just a little longer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: But, Mcqueen…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: … Those who participated in the Selection Race were all exceptional beyond imagination.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Tracen Academy is filled with talented elites… I thought I understood that, but it seems like my determination was still lacking.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But, I won't let it end like this! I will most definitely redeem my honor in the next Selection Race!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For I am a Mejiro horsegirl…!
As Mejiro McQueen spoke these words, her eyes held a profound determination…

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Oh my, if it isn't the new promising trainer standing here!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: After watching the Selection Race, did any of the competitors pique your interest?
The following day, I decided to go and meet Mejiro McQueen.
